description:
Seth is still unable to control his rampaging power. He tries to suppress it by force, but only ends up closer to being completely engulfed by it. But by thinking about all the bonds and relationships he`s forged up to this point, Seth experiences an awakening and learns to use his power to create rather than destroy. He also learns that if he can use his power of creation correctly, the world that was once filled with pixies could be reborn. So Seth then leaves Myr with a new hope...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À présent, ressens le monde: Resonance
